autoSave.description: General--Automatically save the content being edited.

autoSaveDelay.description: General--The time in ms after a change that the file is saved.

titleBarStyle.description: General--The title bar style (Windows and Linux system only).

openFilesInNewWindow.description: General--Open files in a new window.

openFolderInNewWindow.description: General--Open folder via menu in a new window.

zoom.description: General--The zoom level. Between 0.5 and 2.0 inclusive.

wordWrapInToc.description: General--Whether to enable word wrap in TOC.

fileSortBy.description: General--Sort files in opened folder by created time, modified time and title.

startUpAction.description: General--The action after MarkText startup, open the last edited content, open the specified folder or blank page

defaultDirectoryToOpen.description: General--The default directory that should be opened on startup when startUp=folder.

editorLineWidth.description: Editor--Defines the maximum editor area width. An empty string or suffixes of ch (characters), px (pixels) or % (percentage) are allowed.

codeFontSize.description: Editor--Font size in code Block, the range is 12 ~ 18

codeFontFamily.description: Editor--Font family used in code block

codeBlockLineNumbers.description: Editor--Whether to show the line numbers

trimUnnecessaryCodeBlockEmptyLines.description: Editor--Trim the beginning and ending empty lines in code block

endOfLine.description: Editor--The newline character used at the end of each line. The default value is default, which selects your operating system's default newline character.

autoGuessEncoding.description: Editor--Try to automatically guess the file encoding when opening files.

hideQuickInsertHint.description: Editor--Hide hint for quickly creating paragraphs

hideLinkPopup.description: Editor--Hide link popup when the cursor is hover on the link

autoCheck.description: Editor--Whether to automatically check related task.

bulletListMarker.description: Markdown--The marker used in bullet list

orderListDelimiter.description: Markdown--The dilimiter used in order list

preferHeadingStyle.description: Markdown--The preferred heading style in MarkText

tabSize.description: Markdown--Replace the tab with x spaces

superSubScript.description: Markdown-Enable pandoc's markdown extension superscript and subscript.

theme.description: Theme--Select the theme used in MarkText

autoSwitchTheme.description: Theme--Automatically adjust application theme according system.

imageInsertAction.description: Image--The default behavior after insert image from local folder

imagePreferRelativeDirectory.description: Image--Whether to prefer the relative image directory.

sideBarVisibility.description: View--Whether the side bar is visible.

sourceCodeModeEnabled.description: View--Whether the source-code mode is enabled by default.

searchExclusions.description: Searcher--List of glob patterns to exclude from search.

searchMaxFileSize.description: Searcher--The maximal file size (<maxFileSize><suffix>). Suffixes of K, M or G are allowed if not suffix is given the number is treated as bytes.

searchIncludeHidden.description: Searcher--Whether to search in hidden files and directories.

searchNoIgnore.description: Searcher--Whether to ignore ignore files like .gitignore.

watcherUsePolling.description: Watcher--Whether to use polling. Polling may leads to high CPU utilization but is necessary to watch files over a network.
